resilientplotterclass
  • Usage Examples
  • Draw Map
  • View page source

Draw Map

Packages

[1]:

from resilientplotterclass import rpc

Map

[2]:

# Create map
m = rpc.map(location=(52.3784, 4.9009), zoom_start=8)

# Show map
rpc.show(m=m)
Make this Notebook Trusted to load map: File -> Trust Notebook

Draw map

[5]:

# Create map
m = rpc.draw_map(center=[52.3784, 4.9009], zoom=8)

# Show map
rpc.show(m=m)

[5]:

[6]:

# Get geometries
gdf_geoms = m.get_geometries()

# Show geometries
gdf_geoms.head()

[6]:
geometry
